0010000110111010 1011001100010001 0 -> sum: 1101010011001011, cout: 0
0011010011000011 1000111100111001 0 -> sum: 1100001111111100, cout: 0
0100011011010100 1111001101101110 0 -> sum: 0011101001000010, cout: 1

1110000011100001 0000101101010101 0 -> sum: 1110110000110110, cout: 0
1111001000011000 1110010101100001 0 -> sum: 1101011101111001, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000000 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
